== Trivia ==
*The reason for the green dye + white dye instead of the yellow dye + green dye as its crafting recipe is because in some languages, "lime" doesn't mean "lime", but rather, "light green" instead.
**In French, the name is "vert clair"
**In German, the name is "Hellgrün"
**In Dutch, the name is "Lichtgroen"
